title: Does riot refund RP purchases?
body: I bought RP by mistake I did not spend any, does anyone know if they refund it?

replies.body: We might be bale to work something out here!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will see what can be done about this.  See you there!
Submit a ticket and ask them. Although I am not sure how you entered payment information, clicked purchase RP, chose the payment method, and clicked accept all on accident.
Info is saved, was looking at prices, client bugged out then i had rp
Then open a support ticket and they should assist you.
